resources.string: Entrepreneur and business tycoon. He is the founder, CEO and chief engineer of SpaceX; early stage investor, CEO and product architect of Tesla, Inc.; founder of The Boring Company; and co-founder of Neuralink and OpenAI. With an estimated net worth of about $221 billion as of March 2022, Musk is the richest person in the world according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index and Forbes Real Time Billionaires List.
